Cheick Fantamady Camara (1960 - Jenụwarị 7, 2017) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Guinea na-enweta ihe nrite
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri abụọ dị mkpirikpi na ihe nkiri abụọ

Ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2006 Il va pleuvoir sur Conakry meriri 2007 Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou na Burkina Faso na 2008 Prix Ousmane Sembène na Khouribga African Cinema Festival na Morocco.

A mụrụ Cheick Fantamady Camara na 1960 na Conakry, Guinea. Mgbe ọ bi na France mgbe ọ dị afo iri anọ, ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na edemede na Institut national de l'audiovisuel, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1997. Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, na 1998, ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na Louis Lumière College.
Camara malitere site na iduzi ihe nkiri abụọ dị mkpirikpi: Konorofili nke afọ 2000 na Bé Kunko na 2004
O mechara duzie ihe nkiri abụọ: Il va pleuvoir sur Conakry na 2006 na Morbayssa na 2010.

Camara meriri Prix RFI du Public na 2007 Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou na Burkina Faso na 2008 Prix Ousmane Sembène na Khouribga African Cinema Festival na Morocco maka Il va pleuvoir sur Conakry
Camara nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 7, 2017, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na asaa.
